Package by.epam.tour_agency.dao

Interface TourDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FileTourDAO
    public interface TourDAO
    Interface to access Tour DAO.

      Delete tour from DAO.

      Find a tour by its id.

      Gets id of last tour in DAO, so that in the future each tour has a unique id.

        java.util.List<Tour> readTours()
                        throws DAOException
        Read all tours from DAO.
        Returns:
        list of read tours or empty list if there are no tours

        DAOException

      • lastId

        int lastId()
    throws DAOException
        Gets id of last tour in DAO, so that in the future each tour has a unique id.

        Throws:
        DAOException
